participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, Luna enjoys expressing herself through cosplay and is passionate about music and performance.
participant_1.background: I spent my last summer riding horses and learning more about music with friends who understand my passion. I have a pet snake. I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments. I cosplay with my husband and enjoy going to Comic Con. My wedding planning business took off after I had my home featured in a magazine for being the cleanest in the city.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Max has a love for physical challenges and enjoys creative hobbies like welding.
participant_2.background: I love to weld and rock climb! I drink milk to help me digest my large meals. I enjoy jazz music. I remember visiting the petting zoo with my parents and brother when I was a kid. I enjoy strong female characters in my movies.

content.text: Not much! Just got home from work, about to eat some dinner, then relax for the evening. What are you up to?
I just got done with a cosplay photoshoot and am now getting ready to head to my favorite coffee shop.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of cosplay were you doing?
I was cosplaying as Harley Quinn. I'm actually a bit of a nerd, I love cosplaying and going to comic cons.
That's really cool! I love comic cons too! I've always wanted to go as a superhero, but I'm not sure I'm brave enough to wear a tight costume in public.
You should totally do it! It's so much fun and everyone is super supportive.
Maybe I will! I'm going to need some help finding a good costume though.
I know a great place that sells cosplay costumes. I can give you the name if you want.
No problem! What kind of superhero are you thinking of being?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking maybe Wonder Woman or Captain Marvel.
Both of those are great choices! I'm sure you'd look amazing in either one.
Thanks! I'm excited to start planning it out.
